context.p: In the HuViz prototype, the pre-loaded datasets are generated from the Orlando textbase and organized by theme.

step.cmd: Click the Commands tab to open the main control panel.
At the top of the panel, click the drop down menu labelled "Pick a Dataset."
Hover over specific datasets to view a list of attributes.
step.info: The number of nodes, edges and predicates are a general indication of the size and complexity of the network.

step.cmd: Click on the dataset to load.
step.info: The size of a dataset (i.e. number of nodes and predicates it contains) will effect the loading time.

taskbody.result: Once the data has finished parsing, the process is complete. The dataset has sucessfully loaded and nodes are in orbit, ready for action.
